experience: Sharp Decisions Inc. 25+ years in strategic business and information technology consulting, training, and project management. The Sharp Decisions Difference:Whether we are sourcing resources from our broad pool of exceptionally talented consultants or providing highly trained and disciplined armed forces veterans from our V.E.T.S.™ Program, we do the heavy lifting and due-diligence. We offer the best talent and solutions for our clients. This is why Sharp Decisions is one of the few firms routinely on the most recognized and respected companies’ short list of go-to technology solution providers. We are passionate about doing right – by our clients, employees and community. We are not afraid to try new approaches or change the way we do business to achieve our clients’ goals.Integrity counts; it is what opens doors to new relationships and is the cornerstone upon which long-term relationships are built. Our word is our bond and we know our reputation is only as good as our customers’ most recent experience with us.At Sharp Decisions, our strong relationships with our clients allow us to better understand their business challenges to deliver the best solutions. More than just technology experts, our consultants genuinely care about our clients and are relentless in finding new and innovative ways to help them succeed by delivering on…Every Promise, Every Project, Every Time.

* (Promoted to N. American Sales Manager,Enterprise)eKomi, The Feedback Company is the largest independent 3rd Party World Leader in transaction-based reviews & ratings. We are a Certified Google Partner and with over 200+ employees and headquartered in Berlin, Germany and now Los Angeles, CA. Other Locations include San Francisco, CA, Paris, London and Madrid. As a collective, we have published over 13 million reviews and maintain an rating of 4.7 rating for that of our customers. Servicing more than 14 thousand companies, eKomi's groundbreaking Enterprise Solution ranks number one for social commerce, gauging a true overall customer experience. The time to consider your online reputation management has arrived. Using customer reviews, we boost a company's Organic or SEO by 17% by activating their Google Star Ratings, thereby reducing Ad-word cost and overall spend, in addition to managing through a dashboard containing all of your UGC and analytics, heat maps, etc. This is just the tip-of-the-iceberg to come. visit our site and see more(Click Logo) - or - Feel free to call me for a quick 10-15 min demo.

summary: I love my job -The impact of a recruiter is twofold: first, you can literally change the life of an individual by placing them in their dream job, and second, you can effectively change the direction and the success of a corporation with a single great hire in a key job.10+ years of IT experience across multiple industries. Specializing in finding you the best fit every time! I love Technology almost as much as I love working with people. As a recruiter I can do both, I'm here to help! The customer always comes first.
